content: the alora wrap is a beautiful romantic feminine wrap perfect for date night a day out with the girls or just to dress up an outfit with alternating sections of lace and solid stitching and a length to wrap around you it will keep you warm in a spring breeze but is lightweight enough not to overheat using only basic stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet to create the beautiful details of this wrap this pattern is perfect for beginners this **advanced beginner** pdf has everything you might need to make this pattern including a tutorial and linked video tutorial for the foundation double_crochet supplemental pattern pictures a video showing the first 15 row a stitch chart and a row tracker not a beginner the pdf also has a consolidated printer-friendly version of the pattern for you more experienced crocheters **included in the interactive pdf us terms english only ** * cover page with a large full-color photo of the finished item * required materials pattern notes etc page * foundation double_crochet full-color photo tutorial with link to video tutorial * detailed pattern with supplemental instructional photos notes and tips and tricks * supplemental video showing how to work the main pattern repeat * consolidated pattern printer-friendly for more experienced crocheters * completion page with additional full-color photo of the finished item * stitch chart * row tracker **other details ** finished size approximately 79 5″ 202 cm l x 15 75″ 40 cm h after blocking **let s keep in touch ** want to be the first to know when a new pattern drops join my email list get details and sign up here 1 want to hang out me too find me on instagram 2 facebook 3 + youtube 4 thanks for supporting my business i hope you enjoy the pattern and feel free to message me if you have any questions 1 https //www hooksbookswanderlust com/free-printable/ 2 https //www instagram com/hooksbookswanderlust/ 3 https //www facebook com/hooksbookswanderlust 4 https //www youtube com/hooksbookswanderlust
